Either close or delete the existing index or restore the index under a different name by providing a rename pattern and replacement name ``` **Issue Reasons:** - [main] 6 failures in test testDeletionOfFailingToRecoverIndexShouldStopRestore (3.3% fail rate in 180 executions) - [main] 2 failures in step part1 (9.5% fail rate in 21 executions) - [main] 4 failures in step part-1 (5.0% fail rate in 80 executions) - [main] 2 failures in pipeline elasticsearch-intake (9.5% fail rate in 21 executions) - [main] 3 failures in pipeline elasticsearch-pull-request (3.8% fail rate in 80 executions) **Note:** This issue was created using new test triage automation.
